    Megatron looked hell Beast over from head to toe. He looked aged from the 
alst time he saw him, which was only a few months ago. What happened scince 
then must have been stressful.
    "Join me?" He questioned the senator. Megatron wanted him to join him, 
but couldnt come right out and say it. He didnt want to seem desperate, which 
he was.
    Hell Beast nodded a smooth nod. "Yes, I think you and I would make an 
awesome force to be rekoned with. Dont you agree?"
    Megatron laughed and put an arm around Hell Beast. "Yes, together we 
shall bring the Maximals to their knees!"
    The two tyrants marched into the command room to decide who to attack 
first.

    Inferno was hit by the optic blasts sent from Drillbit, but it was a 
little painful. "For the glory of the royalty!" He said, and charged the bot 
fireing 15 fireballs at him, heading dead on to tackle him.

    Aracnia handed over a data pad to Cyber claw. It gave all the info on 
Kitkat and her coordinates. "Dose that suffice?"
